dt: {bc}capable of alteration by growth and development
{bc}of, relating to, or characterized by formative effects or formation

shortdef: giving or capable of giving form : constructive
used in word formation or inflection
capable of alteration by growth and development; also : producing new cells and tissues

dt: {bc}the element (such as a suffix) in a word that serves to give the word appropriate form and is not part of the base
